channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Trump Administration Is Coming for Nonprofits. They're Getting Ready
item.description: As the Trump administration threatens them, liberal nonprofits have been quietly preparing to do everything from surrendering 501(c)(3) status to relo...

item.title: Visa crackdowns are blocking students’ study-abroad dreams, so India’s Leverage Edu is rerouting them
item.description: Leverage Edu places over 10,000 students annually into universities across 11 countries.

item.title: The Best Linen Sheets for Cool and Comfy Sleeping (2025)
item.description: Linen might not be your first choice for bedsheets, but it’s got enough benefits that it's worth a try. Here’s the linen we love sleeping on.

item.title: There’s Never Been a Worse Time to Be Authentic at Work
item.description: Workers have been told to bring themselves to work, only to be disappointed time and time again, argues author Jodi-Ann Burey in her new book.

item.title: Jimmyjane Hello Touch Pro Review: A Vibrator Designed Like Earbuds
item.description: These finger vibrators come with an earbud-like rechargeable case, but a few too many flaws ruin the fun idea.

item.title: Jeff Bezos’ Blue Origin Wins Contract to Take NASA Rover to the Moon
item.description: The Amazon founder’s space company will transport NASA's VIPER rover to the lunar south pole—if it proves capable of delivering a payload to the moon ...

item.title: Instagram head says company is not using your microphone to listen to you (with AI data, it won’t need to)
item.description: The idea that Meta would secretly turn on the microphones on users' phones to record their conversations is an age-old conspiracy theory -- and one th...

item.title: Self-driving trucks startup Einride raises $100M
item.description: Einride raised the funds five months after founder Robert Falck left the CEO role and took over as executive chairman of the board.

item.title: OpenAI staff grapples with the company’s social media push
item.description: Current and former OpenAI researchers seem torn over how the company's Sora app fits in with its broader mission.

item.title: Better Tomorrow Ventures closes $140M, remains bullish on fintech
item.description: The six-year-old firm's third fund is nearly the size of it previous fund raised during the fintech boom in early 2022.
